reference.title: MME support for IoT purge timer provisioning range to 30 days (Feature f12005-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature introduces a new purge timer for IoT devices on the MME. The new purge timer provides the ability to extend the purge timer for IoT devices to 30 days (1 - 720 hours).

table.title: MME support for IoT purge timer provisioning range to 30 days: feature summary

row.entry: MME support for 320 hours unit in the T3412 extended timer (Feature f10409-02)
This feature applies only to 4G IoT devices on the MME.
